Instruction: Peel and chop the sweet potatoes into large chunks.
Place the sweet potatoes in a large pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat and cook until the sweet potatoes are tender, about 15-20 minutes.
Drain the sweet potatoes and return them to the pot.
Add the butter, heavy cream, salt, black pepper, and ground cinnamon to the pot.
Mash the sweet potatoes until smooth and creamy.
Stir in the maple syrup until well combined.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed.
